text: A router uses the following routing table: 144.16.0.0 | 255.255.0.0 144.16.64.0 | 255.255.224.0 144.16.68.0 | 255.255.255.0 144.16.68.64 | 255.255.255.224 | eth3 | Packet bearing a destination address 144.16.68.117 arrives at the router. On which interface will it be forwarded? A. eth0 B.ethl C. eth2 D. eth3 gateit-2006 computer-networks subnetting normal isr02015
